welcome_message_body: Welcome to Alcorcon! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, lively cultural scene, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Barajas Airport, with a modern design and state-of-the-art facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, mainly used for long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
